alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 9:36PM PST until March 10 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches near 2500 feet with higher amounts across taller ridges. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
